definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (prob. contr. fr. [[יהוהוא]] = ´[[י]] is He, cf. [[יֵשׁוּעַ]] and reff.; cuneif. Ia-u-a COT 1Ki 16:23, 2Ki 9:2 (further Schr:MBAW 1880, 277, ZA iii. 3 Hpt:BAS i. 296, 329 Jäger:ib. 468); cf. also [[אֱלִיהוּ]])—

king of Israel who overthrew the dynasty of Omri (LXX Ei)ou, A oft. )Ihou, LXXL )Iou 1Ki 19:16, 1Ki 19:17, 1Ki 19:17, 2Ki 9:2 + 36 t. 2Ki 9 & 2Ki 10 + 2Ki 12:2, 2Ki 13:1, 2Ki 14:8, 2Ki 15:12; 2Ch 22:7, 2Ch 22:8, 2Ch 22:9, 2Ch 25:17, Ho 1:4. †
prophet of N. Israel in time of Baasha & Jehoshaphat (LXX Ei)ou, A Ei)hou LXXL )Iou in K; LXX )Iou, )Ihsou, A LXXL )Ihou in Ch) 1Ki 16:1, 1Ki 16:7, 1Ki 16:12, 2Ch 19:2, 2Ch 20:34. †
one of David's heroes 1Ch 12:3 (LXX )Ihoul, LXXL )Ihoud). †
a Judaite 1Ch 2:38, 1Ch 2:38 (LXX )Ihouv, A LXXL )Ihou). †
a Simeonite prince 1Ch 4:35 (LXX ou(=tov i.e. [[הוּא]]([[י]]); A LXXL )Ihou).
